appDescription.message: Fill out any web form by using only your voice!

popup_allow_permission_btn_str.description: String on the button on popup page that allows user to navigate to permissions page

popup_allow_permission_btn_tooltip_str.message: click here to Allow Audio Permission

popup_help_desc_str.message: If you have experienced any issue, please report it

popup_default_language_label_str.description: label for default language on popup

popup_mic_btn_tooltip_str.message: Click here to turn On/Off Speech Recognition
popup_mic_btn_tooltip_str.description: mic button tooltip on popup page

option_permission_success_msg.message: Now you can close this tab and use this tool to type on any website with your voice!
option_permission_success_msg.description: success message when user accepts permission

option_permission_error_msg.message: Please Allow Permissions in order to use this tool!
option_permission_error_msg.description: error message when user rejects permission

emoji_not_found.description: message to when emoji is not found.

option_emoji_setting_str.description: emoji setting label on option page

popup_help_how_to_use_str.description: How to use this tool ? string

command_emoji_description.message: Say 'emoji emoji's name' to insert somewhat similar emoji from list of 1800 emojis. checkout full list of emojis in setting page

command_press_enter_description.message: Say press enter to Press 'Enter' key. Useful for submitting forms

command_redo_description.message: Say redo to redo the changes

command_undo_description.message: Say undo to undo the changes

command_newline_description_new.message: Say new line to get a new line.
